Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is an energy conversion technology featuring high efficiency, power density, durability, and fuel compatibility.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: In practice, however, SOFCs reach high power and high efficiency at different operating conditions.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: Hence, the optimal feasible operating condition is not straightforward and requires optimization.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: To resolve this problem, an accurate pretrained Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) model was developed as a surrogate of a 2D multi-physics model.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: For calibration, a planar SOFC with a 10 x 10 cm2 active area was tested at varied operating conditions.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: The resulting voltage error of the surrogate model was as low as 0.513%.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: The average runtime of the PINN model was 0.5 ms per case.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: Moreover, the PINN model accepts cell performance parameters as input and is therefore highly flexible.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: The surrogate was thereafter employed to generate performance maps that visualize the steady operating states at each combination of H2 flowrate and operating voltage.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: The voltages of peak power points and anode-safety boundaries were plotted as functions of H2 flowrate, so that the optimal operating conditions are shown graphically and can be tracked conveniently as the cell degrades.
Titulo: Performance map and operating condition optimization of industrial-size SOFCs using a PINN surrogate model

Sentencas: Further studies involving hydrocarbon fuels will be carried out in the future.(c) 2023
